root.name: Cake Mania 2: Jill's Next Adventure!
root.description: OverviewAfter stopping big business from taking over her grandparent's bakery, Jill is back for another round of cake baking adventure in Cake Mania 2. This sequel expands greatly on the gameplay from the first title by adding a "choose-your-own-adventure" aspect to the game, allowing players to choose which tasks to tackle next. With six story endings in all, players are able to explore the arctic tundra, the big city, Hollywood, and even the future at their own leisure.FeaturesJill spends another month helping customersOver 200 levels of cake baking simulationSix different story endings50 kitchen upgrades, including faster movement and intricate cake toppersMultiple gameplay modes including the single player career and an endless baking modeAbility to save multiple profiles and compare the scores of each18 new and different customer types, ranging from school children to aliensSystem Requirements (PC Version)Windows 98SE/ME/2000/XP500 MHz Pentium 2 or better128 MB of RAMDirectX 7 or above3D Video Card with 16MB Video RAMVista Specific Requirements:800 Mhz modern processor512 MB RAMGraphics processor that is DirectX 9 capable
